short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension summarizes text in the language available from English, French, Spanish, German, Chinese, Hindi, Telugu, and Tamil'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension uses ‘OpenAI’ technology to summarize text and translate from a long text written in English  to multiple languages. The languages to summarize the text can be selected from the available options - English, French, Spanish, German, Chinese, Hindi, Tamil and Telugu.
